BANK HOLIDAY: 17 January 2022 – USD payments paused
USD deposits and withdrawals will be paused Monday, Jan 17, due to the public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday on Monday, 17 January 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for all USD payments will be closed. USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – Tuesday, 18 January 2022.

EUR and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

For any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.
